content: all aboard let your little one set sail for adventure in this adorable jumper with sail boat motif some things you might like to know before downloading the pattern skill level adventurous beginner to intermediate skills required cast on the knit stitch the purl stitch k2tog p2tog yarn round needle increasing and cast off sizes on this pattern 0-3 months 3-6 months and 6-12 months materials required 220m 260m 340m dk yarn 3 25 and 4mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge stitch holders darning needle pins 3 buttons gauge/gauge is approximately 22 stitches x 30 row to 10cm notes this pattern is written in a line by line format the boats are charted and there is one chart per sweater size sweaters are knit from the bottom up i am not a pattern designer just some-one who enjoys playing around with stitches and seeing what i can make if you spot a mistake or have a question please send me a message pattern updated 6th october 2021 now for the the boring bit with respect please do not take credit for the pattern claim the pattern as your own or sell the pattern selling completed sweaters is fine but not the pattern or any part of the pattern if you sell the sweaters online please link back to me for pattern credit by using this pattern you are agreeing to my terms thank-you and happy knitting
